name: Dash of Faith
description:
Dash of Faith is a fast paced 2D platformer with an eyecatching dash as core mechanic.

Dash of Faith is a 2D Game, which is developed by Students in their first semester of S4G School for Games in Berlin.

At last it's here! We are very proud to present you our new trailer. We hope you have as much fun playing as we had developing it and wish you a lot of fun with Dash of Faith, which will be released on 06.03.2020.

  

Visit us also on Facebook and Instagram, there you can learn more about the Progress and stay up to date!
